A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Being a major Star Wars fan\, and in fact being named after the main character from Star Wars\, I was really hoping to like this movie and was very excited to see it. After leaving the theater I resigned to the fact that I will never see another Star Wars movie again. Terrible acting\, major plot holes\, pointless humor\, and zero direction. It was such a painful movie going experience that I ended up missing key plot twists because I was either distracted by juvenile humor and terrible acting\, or I simply just didn't care. I would love to discuss this with one of the hundreds of film critics who gave it positive reviews\, because I believe they were viewing this movie through a rose colored lens\, not a critical thinking one. It is hard to ignore the glaring plot holes\, nay\, I would say impossible!
